author: akarzazi
body:
# Steps to reproduce

```powershell
$secureString = 'somepassword' | ConvertTo-SecureString -AsPlainText -Force
$credential = New-Object pscredential('somuser', $secureString)
$sess = New-PSSession -ComputerName 'servername' -Credential $credential


Copy-Item -FromSession $sess -Path $serverPath  -Destination $localPath -Recurse -Filter "appsettings.config"
```

# Actual behavior

```none
FromSession breaks Filter parameter
When using the parameter FromSession, the Filter parameter is ignored. All files are copied.
```

# Environment data
The remote session uses WinRM

Here is the configuration for the launching local session
<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->

```none

Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      6.2.3
PSEdition                      Core
GitCommitId                    6.2.3
OS                             Microsoft Windows 10.0.18362
Platform                       Win32NT
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0…}
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
WSManStackVersion              3.0
```

This issue also exists in 5.1
title: Copy-item : Filter/Include ignored when using FromSession
